body_html:
What this issue refers to should be fixed.
But you are right, I am not sure how the options set by configure are handled.

@kirilg @raraujosc @nealwu how do you handle configure script when depending on tensorflow as an external dependency?
Do you simply default to GPU? Or create your own configure script?

body:
What this issue refers to should be fixed.
But you are right, I am not sure how the options set by `configure` are handled.

@kirilg @raraujosc @nealwu how do you handle `configure` script when depending on tensorflow as an external dependency?
Do you simply default to GPU? Or create your own configure script?
